author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

Switch to using a fixed sized buffer and calls to std::to_chars to create the string that holds the transition id (i.e. run, luminosityblock and event ids) for messages.

igProf shows this is now 50x faster.

#### PR validation:

The FWCore/Framework and FWCore/MessageService unit tests all pass.
title: Faster formatting of header for MessageLogger
